item.description:
SATURDAY EVENING, MAY 12, 2012   7:30P

7:30 - Cocktails and Introductions

8:15 - Light Dinner

- Dance Instruction

9:00 - 9:30 -  General Dancing and Twist Contest

10:15 - Dance Performances

General Dancing Resumes until 11:30

 

 

Ready to dance? The Dance Craze Has Come Back!

Ballroom, latin, twist and more… plus, Diana will be offering complimentary sparkling wine drinks like bellinis and mimosas. In addition, if sparkling wine does not tickle your fancy, you are also welcome to bring your own beer or wine to the dance. A light dinner of  lasagna and salad is included to make sure you have the energy to keep on dancing all night long!!

SuperShag Dance Studio in Waltham is the spot! Make sure you sign up early for this one of a kind night out.

 

We are expecting 80 - 100 dancers for the event. Notice  is posted on 3 meetup groups, on air commercials at WODS radio, and through social media.

Sponsored by:

Introductions By Diana LLC

www.introductionsbydiana.com

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: A Dance With A Twist
